techmeme.title: MediaTek reports sales up 22.4% YoY to ~$16.2B in 2024 and net profit up 38.2% YoY to ~$3.24B, posting its first sales and profit growth in two fiscal years (Hideaki Ryugen/Nikkei Asia)
Three fundamental principles for the future of AI policymaking: have a clear view of reality, be pragmatic instead of ideological, and empower the AI ecosystem (Fei-Fei Li/Financial Times)
Sources: TSMC is informing Chinese customers using its 16nm or better tech that it cannot ship orders unless they use a US "white list" chip packaging supplier (Cheng Ting-Fang/Nikkei Asia)
CoinMarketCap: Circle's USDC market cap reached a new high of $56.2B on February 9, after dropping to $24.5B in 2023 in the months following FTX's collapse (Monique Mulima/Bloomberg)
PlayStation Network has been experiencing a multi-hour outage, affecting account management, gaming and social, and PlayStation Video, Store, and Direct website (Jay Peters/The Verge)
